channel.title: Just getting into modeling :p
channel.description:
Well 3D modeling looks pretty fun and rewarding to see your work afterwards. So I wanted to start doing it. :p
Well while I was waiting for my models to be downloaded from the jagex servers I was fooling around getting use to the metaseq program.
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/21d5ed.png[/img]

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @Gnarly3 Gnarly...
item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

Okay lol guys, stop post now.
This was just meant to show people that I’m getting into modeling and this was just me fooling around getting to know the program.

Read full topic

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:16, topic:281955”]In some way it is, but his model is entirly flat.
2d models are also flat, but they got more shape ( 2 dimensional ) :p[/quote]
Alright.

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

[quote=“Assassins Creed Fan, post:9, topic:281955”]Gnarly… , i think that krackkid is quite right about this.
Models are like ALWAYS 2D or 3D.
Yours is FLAT
Altough, because you’re a beginning modeller I guess that you will get better.
As i always recommend people, PRACTICE , PRACTICE , [b]PRACTICE[/quote]
Correct me if I’m wrong but aren’t 2d and flat the same thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Wow leave off him, think it’s a little harsh against a person for this, it isn’t half bad, he was only experimenting, and by my point of view, he has learnt a few tools, the create tool, primitive (and how to segment), rotate, scale, mat (and the material panel), and how to create a render, so well done for that.
Seriously, back off.

Read full topic

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“wayzey, post:6, topic:281955”]Gnarly do you really think that’s appropriate. I get what you did, it’s a lame attempt at a joke that was made in the last thread made and really you’re just pushing it mate.

Look it is a model, it’s a shitty, offensive model. It’s like me making a the KKK symbol in metaseq adding a ball and calling it a model, I mean really… not appropriate.[/quote]
see now get the fuck off these boards and I dont hurt my self with my words I am smarter then half the people on this place think! you are just a little kid who thinks he can model now fucking leave, if you think thats a appropriate model for this board w8 for the really good modelerrs to get on…I hope they tell you what they think…

Read full topic

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p

item.description:

Gnarly do you really think that’s appropriate. I get what you did, it’s a lame attempt at a joke that was made in the last thread made and really you’re just pushing it mate.

Look it is a model, it’s a shitty, offensive model. It’s like me making a the KKK symbol in metaseq adding a ball and calling it a model, I mean really… not appropriate.

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @Gnarly3 Gnarly...
item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

Hey don’t hurt yourself saying them big words!
And listen you half-brained moron, anything you can make in that program is a MODEL, no matter how shitty, simple it is.
Just because it’s not a weapon or any fancy thing the people make on this board, doesn’t mean it’s not a model.
And I do believe this is the MODELS board. So since this IS a MODEL, it’s allowed to be here, if you do not like my (first) MODEL, don’t post.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Just getting into modeling :p
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Gnarly…, post:3, topic:281955”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=372585.msg2811415#msg2811415 date=1244026570]
ok wtf…thats not a damn model go read CJs tut and make a good model till then dont come back to this section and post…
[/quote]

Hey listen sonny, it’s obv a real model it you can see that. Why don’t you shut up and read my damn post. Until then don’t come back, jesus christ idiots these days.[/quote]
well no its not…its a load of flat squares and a ball that meta already has in there programed that you can size down. a model is somthing like…a wep,armour,cars,etc… not damn squares on the damn ground with a ball on them leave!
